steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_view_all_projects --> navigate to Page_teams_projects
step 4: At Page_teams_projects click on button_object
step 5: At Page_teams_projects click on hyperlink_organization_management --> navigate to Page_admin_settings
step 6: At Page_admin_settings click on button_select_organization
step 7: At Page_admin_settings click on div_object
step 8: Add visual checkpoint at Page_admin_settings
